techmeme.title: Google adds Gemini in Google Maps in the US, with AI-summarized reviews and answers to conversational questions by users, and adds 150 cities to Immersive View (Emma Roth/The Verge)
The EU Commission opens formal DSA proceedings against Temu over the alleged sales of non-compliant products and its platform design, like addictive features (Dominic Chopping/Wall Street Journal)
The Biden admin unveils an $825M investment in an Albany-based chip research and development facility; the NTSC says the facility aims to drive EUV innovation (Reuters)
An investigation finds eight deceptive operations on Meta's platforms that collectively controlled 340+ Pages and placed 160K+ ads to collect users' information (ProPublica)
Roblox reports Q3 revenue up 29% YoY to $919M, bookings up 34% YoY to $1.13B, above $1B est., and DAUs up 27% YoY to 88.9M; RBLX jumps 15%+ (Cecilia D'Anastasio/Bloomberg)
